about_the_game:
Discover an incredible world full of adventures and stories waiting for you! Embark on a unique journey in Cloud Realms, where floating islands, mysterious dungeons, and sky-high civilizations await your exploration.

Cloud Realms offers a universe above the clouds for you to explore and enjoy at your own pace.

Features:

  • Vast Open World: A massive and diverse world made of blocks, ready for you to explore.
  • Engaging Puzzles: Solve fun and clever challenges along your journey.
  • Rich Stories and Side Quests: Immerse yourself in a variety of stories and quests that enhance your experience.
  • Mysterious Dungeons: Discover numerous dungeons, each filled with its own secrets and mysteries.
  • Unique Biomes: Explore different biomes that change the gameplay, each with its own style and challenges.

Prepare for an unparalleled adventure in a non-linear world where freedom of choice is your greatest ally. Cloud Realms is waiting for you. Come explore the unknown above the clouds!

name: Cloud Realms

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-5700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
